metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9258 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The TDStretch::processSamples function in source/SoundTouch/TDStretch.cppin SoundTouch 1.9.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(infinite loop and CPU consumption) via a crafted wav file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9258` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsoundtouch1 - 1.9.2-3
soundstretch - 1.9.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: soundtouch package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-3').
